body_html: I was able to solve this same problem (under anaconda python 2.7) by updating numpy to 1.11. I see that the OP already has 1.11, but is using python 3. Maybe try either updating all of numpy/scipy/sklearn to latest or reverting to older versions to find the combination that works with python 3?

Maybe try either updating all of numpy/scipy/sklearn to latest or reverting to older versions to find the combination that works with python 3?
